item.description:
Dinner with friends at Bubor Cha Cha Restaurant in Chinatown (45 Beach St - Boston, MA 02111) http://www.buborchacha.com/ (we have reseravtion under Henry Lam)

We will meet around 8:00PM for dinner then we will head over to the party. The party will start at 10:00PM.

Please indicate that you are going to join us for dinner and/or the party.

For those who are going to the party, costume is not required but it is more fun if you have a costume. Ticket information is posted below.

CYPN (Chinese Young Professionals Networking) is hosting a Halloween Costume party on Friday, Oct 28. and we are welcome to join them! They have reserved Royale club in Boston for the event. It's going to be an awesome night out with friends on a Halloween weekend.

You must purchase your tix online. There will be NO tickets at the door. The party is on the 2nd floor (reserved for CYP group).

Tix are $20. Use the link below.

http://www.chinese-ne...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at the restaurant before heading over to Royale.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Burbor Cha Cha followed by Asian Halloween Party at Royale
